Meet Kent White

The White family has been running Glazed Landscaping and Gardening for 6 generations. Kent continues the family tradition and  safeguards bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared.

My grandfather George White layed the foundations of our machine based approach to landscaping. He endowed us with a certain appreciation of nature conservation. Our family mantra:

On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
George White
